The rendered page content contains only a javascript function. Predefined label is not there.

Created an attachment (id=30421)
test report design

while saving report document, it saved page header twice instead of header and footer. In the test report design, the header is empty and the footer contains one item. While reading the page contents, it tries to read page footer contents from the empty slot, that causes the exception.

Fixed.
